CopycatMod:DynamicCard.NAME: Monster Card
CopycatMod:DynamicCard.DESCRIPTION: This card's effect becomes the copy of an enemy move.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Heal HP equal to unblocked damage.

CopycatMod:Mimic.NAME: Mimic
CopycatMod:Mimic.DESCRIPTION: Add a copycatmod:Monster copycatmod:Card containing enemy's last move into your hand. NL Exhaust.
CopycatMod:Mimic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add a copycatmod:Monster copycatmod:Card containing enemy's last move into your hand. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:MirrorMove.NAME: Mirror Move
CopycatMod:MirrorMove.DESCRIPTION: Play the copycatmod:Monster copycatmod:Card containing enemy's last move. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:Metronome.NAME: Metronome
CopycatMod:Metronome.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards of any color. Play it.
CopycatMod:Metronome.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Upgraded cards of any color. Play it.

CopycatMod:BeatUp.NAME: Beat Up
CopycatMod:BeatUp.DESCRIPTION: ALL allies attack the enemy for !M! damage.

CopycatMod:MeFirst.NAME: Me First
CopycatMod:MeFirst.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to... NL

CopycatMod:Transform.NAME: Transform
CopycatMod:Transform.DESCRIPTION: Change your appearance to an enemy. NL At the start of your turn, perform moves of that enemy. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:Sketch.NAME: Sketch
CopycatMod:Sketch.DESCRIPTION: Permanently replace this with the copycatmod:Monster copycatmod:Card containing enemy's last move.
CopycatMod:Sketch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Permanently replace this with the copycatmod:Monster copycatmod:Card containing enemy's last move.

CopycatMod:Substitute.NAME: Substitute
CopycatMod:Substitute.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Lose HP equal to 1/4 of your max HP. NL Create a copycatmod:Substitute with that much HP.

CopycatMod:Charging.NAME: Charging
CopycatMod:Charging.DESCRIPTION: After playing "Charging" twice, add an *Ultimate *Blast on top of your draw pile. It costs 0.
CopycatMod:Charging.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: After playing "Charging" twice, add an *Ultimate *Blast+ on top of your draw pile. It costs 0.

CopycatMod:Enrage.NAME: Enrage
CopycatMod:Enrage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Skill, gain 1 Strength.

CopycatMod:Fly.NAME: Fly
CopycatMod:Fly.DESCRIPTION: For this turn, you take half damage from attacks.

CopycatMod:SummonMonsterCard.NAME: Summon
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This Minion is a clone of an enemy. At the end of your turn, it will use the same moves as the original monster.

CopycatMod:AreaHeal.NAME: Area Heal
CopycatMod:AreaHeal.DESCRIPTION: ALL allies heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:Escape.NAME: Escape
CopycatMod:Escape.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a Smoke Bomb. NL Fleeting.

CopycatMod:Reincarnate.NAME: Reincarnate
CopycatMod:Reincarnate.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a Fairy in a Bottle. NL Fleeting.
CopycatMod:Reincarnate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Obtain !M! Fairies in a Bottle. NL Fleeting.

CopycatMod:Hex.NAME: Hex
CopycatMod:Hex.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, enemy loses !M! HP if it didn't attack. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:PerplexingEye.NAME: Perplexing Eye
CopycatMod:PerplexingEye.DESCRIPTION: Become Confused. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.
CopycatMod:PerplexingEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Become Confused. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional cards.

CopycatMod:Implant.NAME: Implant
CopycatMod:Implant.DESCRIPTION: Steal !M! Max HP from the enemy. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:MultiStabbing.NAME: Multi Stabbing
CopycatMod:MultiStabbing.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage !M! time(s). NL Increase the number of hits of this card by 1 this combat.

CopycatMod:MultiStabbing2.NAME: Multi Stabbing
CopycatMod:MultiStabbing2.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage copycatmod:T + 1 times.

CopycatMod:ItIsTime.NAME: It is Time
CopycatMod:ItIsTime.DESCRIPTION: Cannot play on the first 3 turns. NL Deal !M! + 5 copycatmod:T damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It's too early to use this!

CopycatMod:Divider.NAME: Divider
CopycatMod:Divider.DESCRIPTION: Deal H damage 6 times. ( H = Enemy's HP / 12 + !M! ) NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 6 times. ( H = Enemy's HP / 12 + !M! ) NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
CopycatMod:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 6 times and apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies. NL Upgrade ALL your cards. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:ChampsAnger.NAME: Champ's Anger
CopycatMod:ChampsAnger.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Next turn, enter Wrath. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:Haste.NAME: Haste
CopycatMod:Haste.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! % of your NL Max HP. NL Remove all of your debuffs. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:Haste2.NAME: Haste
CopycatMod:Haste2.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! % of your NL Max HP. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Remove all of your debuffs. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:Debilitate.NAME: Debilitate
CopycatMod:Debilitate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:HybridStrike.NAME: Hybrid Strike
CopycatMod:HybridStrike.DESCRIPTION: (Copies description from Pummel Strike and Cut Through Fate)

CopycatMod:SkewerBlade.NAME: Skewer Blade
CopycatMod:SkewerBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Change the cost to 1 and keep the number of hits for this combat.

CopycatMod:WellPrepared.NAME: Well Prepared
CopycatMod:WellPrepared.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Discard !M! card. NL If you have 6 or more Strength, apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
CopycatMod:WellPrepared.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard !M! cards. NL If you have 6 or more Strength, apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

CopycatMod:DoubleDash.NAME: Double Dash
CopycatMod:DoubleDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage twice.

CopycatMod:ClearFist.NAME: Clear Fist
CopycatMod:ClearFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are in any Stance, draw !M! cards and exit your Stance.

CopycatMod:ClearBody.NAME: Clear Body
CopycatMod:ClearBody.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you are in any Stance, draw !M! cards and exit your Stance.

CopycatMod:Grab.NAME: Grab
CopycatMod:Grab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, enter copycatmod:Protective.

CopycatMod:GlowingCard.NAME: Glowing Card
CopycatMod:GlowingCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you copycatmod:Choose this card, gain !M! Block.

CopycatMod:Protective.NAME: Protective
CopycatMod:Protective.DESCRIPTION: While you are in Protective, all enemies target you. NL When you exit Protective, all attacking enemies change their target to a random Minion.

CopycatMod:TwinSlicer.NAME: Twin Slicer
CopycatMod:TwinSlicer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL If you have 6 or more Strength, heal !M! HP and Exhaust.

CopycatMod:CopycatForm.NAME: Copycat Form
CopycatMod:CopycatForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use an copycatmod:Exclusive copycatmod:Mechanic from other class, gain !M! Block and deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

CopycatMod:UnstablePickup.NAME: Unstable Pickup
CopycatMod:UnstablePickup.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards from your discard pile. NL Put a random one into your hand and the other on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
CopycatMod:UnstablePickup.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards from your discard pile. NL Put a random one into your hand and the other on top of your draw pile.

CopycatMod:PhantomSlime.NAME: Phantom Slime
CopycatMod:PhantomSlime.DESCRIPTION: copycatmod:Summon a copycatmod:Pet copycatmod:Slime with 6 HP. NL It dies after !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:FleshToSlime.NAME: Flesh to Slime
CopycatMod:FleshToSlime.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL copycatmod:Summon a copycatmod:Pet copycatmod:Slime with HP equal to unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:Magnet.NAME: Magnet
CopycatMod:Magnet.DESCRIPTION: Steal all Artifact from the enemy. NL Exhaust.
CopycatMod:Magnet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Steal all Artifact from the enemy. NL Gain 1 Artifact. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:MonsterStudy.NAME: Monster Study
CopycatMod:MonsterStudy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block for each copycatmod:Monster copycatmod:Card in your hand.

CopycatMod:ToxicStab.NAME: Toxic Stab
CopycatMod:ToxicStab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL If the enemy already has Poison, damage and Poison amount are swapped.

CopycatMod:Analysis.NAME: Analysis
CopycatMod:Analysis.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If you have 6 or more Strength, this costs 0.

CopycatMod:Peace.NAME: Peace
CopycatMod:Peace.DESCRIPTION: If you are in Calm, gain !B! Block. Otherwise, Enter Calm.

CopycatMod:DoubleTime.NAME: Double Time
CopycatMod:DoubleTime.DESCRIPTION: Your []Minions perform their move 1 additional time if no enemy intends to attack them.

CopycatMod:Venomology.NAME: Venomology
CopycatMod:Venomology.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, apply !M! Poison to it.

CopycatMod:MonstrousPlan.NAME: Monstrous Plan
CopycatMod:MonstrousPlan.DESCRIPTION: copycatmod:Monster copycatmod:Cards are Retained every turn.
CopycatMod:MonstrousPlan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: copycatmod:Monster copycatmod:Cards are Retained every turn. NL Increase your max hand size to 12.

CopycatMod:StrengthSap.NAME: Strength Sap
CopycatMod:StrengthSap.DESCRIPTION: For this turn, all allies steal !M! Strength from the enemy.

CopycatMod:MindControl.NAME: Mind Control
CopycatMod:MindControl.DESCRIPTION: Take control of an enemy with !M! times X or less HP. NL It becomes your []Minion.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This enemy has too much HP.

CopycatMod:Spotlight.NAME: Spotlight
CopycatMod:Spotlight.DESCRIPTION: Choose an ally to gain !M! Block. NL ALL attacking enemies change their target to the chosen ally.

CopycatMod:Swindle.NAME: Swindle
CopycatMod:Swindle.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL If it does not intend to attack, change its intent to "Deal 10 damage and gain 10 Block".

CopycatMod:SlimeSlasher.NAME: Slime Slasher
CopycatMod:SlimeSlasher.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and Slimes. NL Deals 1 additional damage for every 2 Slimes killed with this.
CopycatMod:SlimeSlasher.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and Slimes. NL Deals 1 additional damage for every Slimes killed with this.

CopycatMod:Scammed.NAME: Scammed!
CopycatMod:Scammed.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:SeesawBlow.NAME: Seesaw Blow
CopycatMod:SeesawBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Vulnerable.
CopycatMod:SeesawBlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak.

CopycatMod:HybridDefense.NAME: Hybrid Defense
CopycatMod:HybridDefense.DESCRIPTION: (Copies description from Leap and Third Eye)

CopycatMod:Lecture.NAME: Lecture
CopycatMod:Lecture.DESCRIPTION: Play a copycatmod:Monster copycatmod:Card from your hand. NL Change enemy's intent to it. NL Exhaust.

CopycatMod:MutantSlime.NAME: Mutant Slime
CopycatMod:MutantSlime.DESCRIPTION: Summon a copycatmod:Pet copycatmod:Slime with !M! HP, who changes their intent to the copycatmod:Monster copycatmod:Card you play. NL Exhaust.
